responses.title: I will suffer no threat to my purpose.
Nature is not for the weak.
I feel the wild in me.
I will suffer no threat to my purpose.
I will suffer no threat to my purpose.
Oh ho ho ho! I'm telling ya! This one is in the bag!
No foe shall stand against my mission!
No foe shall stand against my mission!
It has been too long since these bones felt combat.
It has been too long since these bones felt combat.
I feel the wild in me.
My friend slips from this plane.
Nature's mysteries are revealed to me!
There is much still to be done!
The long years have been kind.
Ha ha ha ha ha! I can still run with these kids
I feel a thousand years younger!
Is more of my power needed?
Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!
Ah ha ha ha ha ha ha!
Nature is not for the weak.
You should have left well enough alone.
You risk more than you know.
Ha ha ha ha, this is exciting.
Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!
Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!
Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha! Isn't this exciting?
Ah ha ha ha ha ha!
Ah ha ha ha ha hah!
Ah ha ha ha ha ha! Ah ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!
A pity. Where was the Ulfsaar that took my finger?
There are more important causes in this world than your cubs, Ulfsaar.
Have you forgotten what I taught you, Ulfsaar?
I've been a bear longer than you have, Ulfsaar.
I will outlive your omens, Destroyer.
You call those the old ways, Witch Doctor?
Whatever happened Enchantress, did you forget your true form?
Hasn't your science done enough damage, Tinker?
Not even Dragon Clan can stand against me!
A pity, I would have liked to hear what the Death Prophet saw for me.
Just what did you think such darkness would bring you, Dazzle?
Invoker, you are naught but an ignorant child.
All your long years have not granted you wisdom.
Eternity will be better off without the Invoker.
Even you must respect my mission, Prophet.
Why would the Prophet stand against me?
I never thought the day would come that the Prophet's blood stained my hands.
You and your pack of mongrels are nothing to me!
You should have brought more wolves.
You have no place here, mutt.
Shapeshift your way out of that!
He won't be needing that fish now, will he?
I normally don't eat saltwater fish.
First blood! The end is set in motion! Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!
Tell me what you see for us, Prophet.
Tell me what you see for us, Prophet.
My spirit requests your aid, Ursa Warrior.
My spirit requests your aid, Ursa Warrior.
You haven't aged a day, Puck.
You haven't aged a day, Puck.
Always pleased to see Dragon Clan!
Let's show them what shifters can do, Lycan!
I welcome the forest's aid, Chen.
I welcome the forest's aid, Chen.
Always pleased to see Dragon Clan!
Let's show them what shifters can do, Lycan!
This dagger lacks the heft of my blade.
A Scepter fit for the high clan lords.
A cuirass to cover my bear ass, ha ha!
A cuirass to cover my bear ass, ha ha!
Mask of Madness! He he he ha ha ha ha!
Eternity is one thing, this is quite another.
Eternity is one thing, this is quite another.
Let me wash off this blood.
The years caught up to me.
The Seed of Victory is still safe!
The Seed of Victory is still safe!
I return so that the world might be mended.
I return so that the world might be mended.
I will be more careful this time.
I will be more careful this time.
Not even death can thwart my quest.
Not even death can thwart my quest.
Ha ha! This is but a short cycle. Ha ha ha ha!
I know a thing or two of patience.
There is yet time for this.
Tis long since I had any kin.
The cool touch of the gentle wild.
Thousands of years of waiting and yet no time to waste.
This burden may be more than I can bear. Heh.
I wonder what awaits me at the end of everything…
Ah ha ha ha ha ha!
Ah ha ha ha ha hah!
Ah ha ha ha ha ha! Ah ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!
Augh! An eternity spent in vain!
I should know better by now.
